about.title: Experienced Lawyers for Expats in Spain
about.description1: With more than a decade of practice in Barcelona, Abogado Gentile is a law firm dedicated to helping expatriates, families, and self-employed professionals navigate the Spanish legal system.
about.description2: Our team combines international expertise with local insight, offering clear, practical, and multilingual legal advice. Whether you are applying for residency, starting a company, or looking for debt forgiveness, we ensure you receive personalized solutions and full legal protection.
